##  Your Cart

__

Free Shipping on Order $80+

Free Shipping

You are $80.00 away from **FREE SHIPPING**

Add a note (optional)

#### Your cart is empty!

Add your favorite items to your cart.

Shop Now

I acknowledge that one or more of the items in my cart are not currently in
stock, and will be shipped within 10-14 weeks. Só Dança will not be able to
cancel your order once the request has been sent. No refunds will be issued
due to time delay.

The class will be filmed and streamed live from Orlando. Tiler Peck and
dancers participating live will not be able to hear or see you. You will have
a good view of Tiler as she demonstrates combinations and then the full studio
will be in view while the class performs them. Tiler's focus will be on the
in-person dancers. She will not be able to communicate with virtual
participants.This is a non-refundable event. Please be sure that you have
adequate internet service beforehand and are familiar with Zoom. Só Dança is
not responsible for poor signals, injury, or anything outside the scope of
providing the virtual class at the scheduled time.If Só Danca chooses to
cancel the event, you will be refunded.
